name: Recycled Beats
description: "Recycled Beats" is a mix CD by DJ Boo dedicated to the power and influence of samples. Each track is an attempt to illustrate how the music of the past influenced and shaped the music of the present. There are tracks from The Juggaknots and John Coltrane, Nas and James Brown, M.I.A. and The Clash and more. Each CD is packaged in recycled cardboard and letter pressed by Lucky 8 Letterpress. FEEL FREE TO LISTEN TO A 15 MINUTE SAMPLE HERE: RECYCLED BEATS by DJ Boo - 15 Minute Sample by Booda X 01 Intro 02 Juggaknots "Trouble Man" + John Coltrane "Favorite Things" 03 A Tribe Called Quest "Scenario (Remix)" + Kool & The Gang "Soul Vibrations" 04 Lords of The Underground "Funky Child" + Skull Snaps "New Day" + James Brown "My Thang" 05 Amerie "One Thing" + The Meters "Oh Calcutta!" 06 M.O.P. "G-Buildings" + Sly & The Family Stone "Don't Call Me N*gga" 07 Nas "Get Down" + James Brown "The Boss" 08 M.I.A. "Paper Planes" + The Clash "Straight To Hell" 09 Lily Allen "Knock'em Out" + Big Chief "Professor Longhair" 10 Deee-Lite "Groove Is In The Heart" + Herbie Hancock "Bring Down The Birds" 11 Madcon "Beggin'" + Frankie Valli & The Four Seasons "Beggin'" 12 Jay Dee "F*ck The Police" + Rene Costy & His Orchestra "Scrabble" 13 A Tribe Called Quest "Find A Way" + Towa Tei "Technova" 14 De La Soul "Watch Out" + Cal Tjader "Mood For Milt" + "Cubano Chant" 15 Black Sheep "Similak Child" + Jefferson Airplane "Today" + Ramsey Lewis "Les Fleurs" 16 The Fugees "Ready or Not" + Enya "Boadicea" 17 Jaylib "Champion Sound" + Kalanji-Anandji "Dharmatma: Theme Music (Sad)" 18 Gang Starr "Just To Get A Rep" + Jean Jacques Perrey "E.V.A." 19 Juggaknots "Liar Liar" + Sly & The Family Stone "Honest" 20 Outro
